.. _manpage:

Application manuals
===================

FabIO is first and formost a library to access images produced by 2D X-ray detectors. 
Few programs, thus available from the command line are also prvided:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   fabio_viewer
   fabio-convert
   eiger2cbf
   eiger2crysalis
   densify_Bragg
